title: Service to Society

description: Conversation on Flint's water infrastructure, community resilience, and the role of architects in public health.

description: Discussion on incremental development, adaptive reuse, and community-driven design in Flint.

description: Exploration of sustainable design, material longevity, and the case against disposable architecture.

description: Firsthand perspective on practicing architecture in Flint during and after the water crisis.

description: Early-career dispatch covering urban design, public interest architecture, and Flint's design potential.
